original_text: What makes our life really rich? We should serve God in a way that pleases him and be happy with the things that we have.
korean_text: 그러나 자족하는 마음이 있으면 경건은 큰 이익이 되느니라

sentences.original_text: What makes our life really rich?
sentences.korean_translation: 무엇이 우리의 삶을 정말 풍요롭게 만들까요?

sentences.original_text: in a way that pleases him
and be happy with the things
